meanings.sent1: The preconstructed model airplane was ready to fly as soon as it was assembled.
meanings.sent2: The preconstructed Lego set made it easy for the child to build a castle.
meanings.sent3: The preconstructed sandwich looked so perfect that it seemed almost too good to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her preconstructed plan for the project saved her a lot of time and effort.
meanings.sent5: The preconstructed bridge stood strong against the rushing river.

meanings.sent1: The preconstructed puzzle was already put together in the box.
meanings.sent2: The preconstructed tent made camping setup quick and simple.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his preconstructed excuse for being late was that he got lost in his own neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The preconstructed friendship between the two neighbors was evident from their first meeting.
meanings.sent5: The preconstructed speech was practiced and polished for the big event.
